com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.info

Class GenericInfoSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.info.GenericInfoSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfoSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AniList

    public class GenericInfoSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements InfoSource
    This class contains implementations for some methods from InfoSource that are expected to be common between most info source plugins.

    For method and field documentation, please see the InfoSource class.

    See Also:
    InfoSource
